document_data.mainbody:
riella Kulmina was a Windsoul genasi swordmage from Airspur.  In 1479 DR she traveled with a delegation from Akan没l to Almraiven.  While in Almraiven she became friends with the Earthsoul genasi Cephas and taught him how to manifest as a Windsoul.	
Like many Windsouls, Ariella has silver skin.
